name: 傅子恒
objective:
本課程《互動程式設計三》旨在提供學生全面的 Unity C# 編程技術及其在 ARPG（動作角色扮演遊戲）開發中的應用。本課程為期 18 週，涵蓋了從基礎到高級的各種主題，並結合實際項目開發，讓學生能夠掌握並應用所學知識。

The course "Interactive Programming Design Integration" aims to provide students with comprehensive Unity C# programming skills and their application in ARPG (Action Role-Playing Game) development. The 18-week course covers a range of topics from basic to advanced, combined with practical project development to enable students to master and apply their knowledge.
